com.hazelcast.spi

Class MembershipServiceEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • com.hazelcast.core.MembershipEvent
        • com.hazelcast.spi.MembershipServiceEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class MembershipServiceEvent
extends MembershipEvent
    Membership event fired when a new member is added to the cluster and/or when a member leaves the cluster.
    See Also:
    MembershipAwareService, Serialized Form
